# Plot social outcomes in scenario 3

```{r}
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)
library(colorspace)
```

```{r}
# load data
data = fread("data/results/data_morphs.csv")
data = data[scenario == "spillover" & gen > 4000]
```

## Summarise metrics by social strategy

```{r}
# summarise mean movement, mean associations, and proportion infected
# by social strategy
data_summary = data[, list(
  moved.mean = mean(moved),
  assoc.mean = mean(assoc),
  prop.infected = sum(t_infec > 0) / length(t_infec)
), by = c("gen", "repl", "social_strat")]

# melt data
data_summary = melt(
  data_summary,
  id.vars = c("gen", "repl", "social_strat")
)

# assign broad strategy
data_summary$social_strat = fifelse(
  data_summary$social_strat %in% c("agent avoiding", "handler tracking"),
  data_summary$social_strat, "other"
)

# split by variable
# data_summary = split(data_summary, by = "variable")
```

```{r}
data_summary = dcast(
  data_summary,
  formula = gen + repl + social_strat ~ variable,
  value.var = "value",
  fun.aggregate = mean
)

plot_move_encounter =
  ggplot(data_summary)+
  geom_point(
    aes(
      moved.mean, assoc.mean,
      shape = social_strat,
      col = social_strat
    ),
    alpha = 0.2,
    fill = "transparent",
    show.legend = T
  )+
  geom_smooth(
    # data = data_summary[social_strat != "handler tracking"],
    aes(
      moved.mean, assoc.mean,
      # group = social_strat != "handler",
      col = social_strat
    ),
    se = T,
    method = "glm",
    # alpha = 0.5,
    show.legend = F
  )+
  scale_colour_discrete_diverging(
    palette = "Blue-Red 2", 
    rev = T,
    l2 = 30,
    c1 = 70,
    l1 = 50,
    name = NULL,
    labels = c(
      "Avoids \nall agents",
      "Tracks \nhandlers",
      "Other social\ninformation strategy"
    )
    # h1 = 20
  )+
  scale_shape_manual(
    values = c(1, 2, 0),
    name = NULL,
    labels = c(
      "Avoids \nall agents",
      "Tracks \nhandlers",
      "Other social\ninformation strategy"
    )
  )+
  scale_y_continuous(
    trans = "log10",
    labels = scales::comma_format()
  )+
  coord_cartesian(
    xlim = c(60, 100),
    ylim = c(10, NA)
    # ratio = 40
  )+
  theme_bw(
    base_family = "Arial"
  )+
  theme(
    axis.text.y = element_text(
      angle = 90,
      hjust = 0.5
    ),
    legend.position = "top",
    legend.justification = "right"
  )+
  labs(
    x = "Distance moved",
    y = "Encounters w/ individuals"
  )+
  guides(
    colour = guide_legend(
      override.aes = list(
        alpha = 1,
        stroke = 1
      )
    )
  )

ggsave(
  plot = plot_move_encounter,
  file = "figures/fig_02.png",
  height = 87,
  width = 87,
  units = "mm"
)
```

```{r}
plot_soc_out = Map(
  data_summary, names(data_summary),
  f = function(df, varb) {
    p = ggplot(df)+
      ggdist::stat_histinterval(
        aes(
          social_strat, value,
          fill = social_strat,
          slab_alpha = 0.8,
          slab_colour = "grey20"
        ),
        n = 25,
        slab_size = 0.3,
        show.legend = F,
        width = 0.8,
        colour = "grey20"
        # colour = "grey",
        # size = 0.2
      )+
      scale_x_discrete(
        breaks = c("agent avoiding", "handler tracking", "other"),
        labels = c("Agent\navoiding", "Handler\ntracking", "Other\nstrategy")
      )+
      scale_fill_manual(
        values = c(
          "agent avoiding" = "seagreen",
          "handler tracking" = "firebrick1",
          "other" = "steelblue"
          )
      )+
      scale_colour_discrete_diverging(
        palette = "Blue-Red 3",
        order = c(2, 1),
        l1 = 30
      )+
      scale_alpha_binned(
        range = c(0.5, 1), trans = "sqrt"
      )+
      theme_test(
        base_family = "Arial",
        base_size = 10
      )+
      theme(
        strip.background = element_blank(),
        strip.text = element_text(
          face = "italic"
        ),
        axis.text.y = element_text(
          angle = 90,
          hjust = 0.5
        ),
        panel.grid.major.x = element_line(
          # colour = "grey",
          size = 0.3,
          linetype = 2,
          color = "grey"
        )
      )+
      scale_y_continuous(
        limits = c(60, NA)
      )+
      labs(
        x = NULL,
        y = "Distance moved"
      )
    
    if(varb == "assoc.mean") {
      p = p + 
        scale_y_continuous(
          trans = "log10",
          labels = scales::comma_format(accuracy = 1),
          limits = c(10, NA)
        ) +
        labs(
          y = "Per-capita encounters"
        )
    } else if(varb == "prop.infected") {
      p = p + 
        scale_y_continuous(
          trans = "sqrt",
          breaks = c(0.01, seq(0.25, 1, 0.25)),
          labels = scales::percent
        ) +
        labs(
          y = "% Agents infected"
        )
    }
    p
  }
)

plot_soc_out = wrap_plots(plot_soc_out) &
  plot_annotation(
    tag_levels = "A"
  ) &
  theme(
    plot.tag = element_text(
      face = "bold"
    )
  )
```
